  • Method Details

    • stringBoard

      public java.lang.String[][] stringBoard()
      Returns:
      2D String version of the board for printing

    • setSpot

      public void setSpot​(Board board, Piece piece, int[] to, int[] from, java.lang.String color)
      This method checks different cases and moves the piece to the desired location if it passes.
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display
      piece - - current object being moved
      to - - location piece is being moved to
      from - - location piece was moved from
      color - - if piece is white or black

    • getSpot

      public Piece getSpot​(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - - row value of spot
      y - - column value of spot
      Returns:
      - return location of piece/certain spot

    • dangerZone

      public java.lang.String[][] dangerZone​(Board board, java.lang.String color)
      Returns a board that will have the locations a piece can attack with the format: 'b' if black piece can move to the spot 'w' if a white piece can move to the spot
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display
      color - - piece color
      Returns:
      - a string of the board that displays where each piece can 'attack'

    • futureDangerZone

      public java.lang.String[][] futureDangerZone​(Board board, int[] to, int[] from, java.lang.String color)
      The same as danger zone but AFTER a piece is moved to the location
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display/being used
      to - - location where piece is going
      from - - location where piece moved from
      color - - piece color
      Returns:
      - string of board danger zone after move is made

    • exposesKing

      public boolean exposesKing​(Board board, int[] to, int[] from, java.lang.String color)
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display/being used
      to - - location where piece is going
      from - - location where piece moved from
      color - - piece color
      Returns:
      true if the move exposes your king to enemy attack

    • castlingHelper

      public boolean castlingHelper()
      Returns:
      returns true if no pieces in between rook and king during castling, false if pieces in the way

    • inCheck

      public boolean inCheck​(Board board)
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display/being used
      Returns:
      true if the king is in the danger zone

    • checkMate

      public boolean checkMate​(Board board)
      Parameters:
      board - - actual board display/being used
      Returns:
      true if a king is in checkmate
